column6:
The secret (and real name) of Tony Stark's bodyguard is finally revealed when Spider-Girl, Dusk, Raptor and the Green Goblin team-up with Hawkeye, Ant-Man and the Scarlet Witch against him. Plus: Moose faces a new crisis and Kaine accidentally sets off a new gang war.,2006,2



32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Sal Buscema | writer:Tom DeFalco | penciller (cover):Ron Frenz | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | letterer:Dave Sharpe
